page.title: 05Cub Pack, Burgess Hill
page.content: The cubs were founded by Lord Baden Powell. This year is the 70th Anniversary of the cubs in the South Down District. I go to 7th Burgess Hill and I go on a Friday night. I'm in the yellow six. We start the evening with flag break, which is when we salute the Union Jack . Then we collect subs which is 30p. Then if the weather's fine we'll go outside and play a game of rounders, kick- rounders or football. I've been a cub for almost a year. I've got nine badges. My cap badge, world badge, pack label badge, county badge, district badge, home help, stage one swimmer and my entertainers badge. My uniform is a green jumper with a dark blue and white scarf, biack or grey trousers or shorts, garters and a green cap with yellow stripes on it.
